articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Cod liver oil embraced amid Texas measles outbreak; doctors fight misinfo - Ars Technica
articles.description: Overdoses of vitamin A have serious risks—and it doesn’t prevent measles.

articles.author: Marina Temkin
articles.title: On a quest to revive the woolly mammoth, Colossal Biosciences has created a woolly mouse - TechCrunch
articles.description: Colossal Biosciences, known for its outlandish goal to resurrect the woolly mammoth by 2028, is claiming steady progress. Its evidence: genetically
articles.content:
Colossal Biosciences, known for its outlandish goal to resurrect the woolly mammoth by 2028, is claiming steady progress. Its evidence: genetically engineering mice to have mammoth-like fur.
